title: Lied during interview, clarified later, they gave training, is job & income halal? assim al hakeem
transcript: sh I know a brother who um initially applied to a job by lying about his experience but later on in the hiring process he said or he clarified he doesn't have that experience and the company they still hired him because he has like relevant knowledge of like protocol and has the required certification not to mention they said they will offer him training is this income as long as they've acknowledged he lied and he is fulfilling the job requirement and they're offering him training he's doing his work he has to repent from lying but the income is halal inshallah if the job is halal
